mapper.sql: id, labeluid, canteenid, recipeid, disktypeid, exw_time, start_time, end_time, valid
mapper.insert:
insert into dh_disk_label
id,
labeluid,
canteenid,
recipeid,
disktypeid,
exw_time,
start_time,
end_time,
valid,
temp,

#{canteenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update dh_disk_label
labeluid = #{labelUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
canteenid = #{canteenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recipeid = #{recipeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
disktypeid = #{diskTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
exw_time = #{exwTime,jdbcType=DATE},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE},
valid = #{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT},
temp = #{temp,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dh_disk_label set labeluid = #{labelUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, canteenid = #{canteenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recipeid = #{recipeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, disktypeid = #{diskTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, exw_time = #{exwTime,jdbcType=DATE}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, valid = #{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT} temp = #{temp,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select ddl.recipeid,ddl.canteenid,ddl.disktypeid,ddl.labeluid,tr.recipe_name as recipeName , ddt.name as diskName,ddl.exw_time,ddl.start_time,ddl.end_time from dh_disk_label ddl,t_recipe tr,dh_disk_type ddt where ddl.recipeid=tr.recipe_id and ddl.disktypeid=ddt.id and ddl.labeluid in
#{item}
mapper.delete: delete from dh_disk_label where disktypeid=#{typeId} and canteenid=#{canteenId}
mapper.update: update dh_disk_label set recipeid=#{recipeId} where disktypeid=#{diskTypeId} and canteenid=#{canteenId}
mapper.select:
select DISTINCT ddl.recipeid,ddl.canteenid,ddl.disktypeid,tr.recipe_name as recipeName ,ddt.name as diskName from dh_disk_label ddl,t_recipe tr,dh_disk_type ddt where ddl.canteenid=#{canteenId} and ddl.recipeid=tr.recipe_id and ddl.disktypeid=ddt.id and ddl.temp=1 order by ddl.id desc
limit #{offset},#{pageSize} ;

select COUNT(DISTINCT (ddl.disktypeid)) AS count from dh_disk_label ddl,t_recipe tr,dh_disk_type ddt where ddl.canteenid=#{canteenId} and ddl.recipeid=tr.recipe_id and ddl.disktypeid=ddt.id and ddl.temp=1
mapper.update: update dh_disk_label set recipeid=#{recipeId} where labeluid=#{uId}
update dh_disk_label set recipeid=#{recipeId} where canteenid=#{canteenId} and disktypeid=#{diskTypeId}
